description: The Sony Alpha 1 (A1) is a flagship full-frame mirrorless camera offering exceptional speed, high resolution, and professional-level video capabilities.
Specification: 50.1 MP full-frame stacked Exmor RS CMOS sensor

description: The Sony A7R V is known for its high-resolution imaging, advanced autofocus system, and superb dynamic range, perfect for detailed photography.
Specification: 61 MP full-frame back-illuminated Exmor R CMOS sensor

description: The Nikon Z9 is a professional full-frame mirrorless camera with groundbreaking features, designed for both photography and video professionals.
Specification: Dual CFexpress Type B card slots
